version_description:
1. iHuman Books have been perfectly adapted to iPhone X.
2. Enhanced feedback for the full collection of secret treasures.
3. Pop-up text added while clicking on the secret treasures in achievement notes.
4. You can choose whether to accept the reminder of new book releases.
5. You will get notification once we reply to your requests or questions.

[New] A mysterious AR castle, where there will be big surprise after gathering all the characters.
[Optimized] Special UI design to celebrate the Chinese New Year.
[Optimized] Notice of new books update when starting the app.
[Optimized] Guidance added for new users on how to operate our picture books.
Fix some small bugs only the programmer knows.
Landscape mode of AR functions enabled for iPad.
Landscape mode of AR functions enabled for iPad.

[New] “Read to me” mode added, with automatic page turns and more relaxed reading experience.
[New] More VIP options, annual subscription enabled.

[New] Preview functions added for paid books, better experience for purchase decision.
[Optimized] More intuitive cover page functions and UI for each book.
[Optimized] Upgraded parental control with enhanced measures to avoid kids access.

[New] Preview functions added for paid books, better experience for purchase decision.
[Optimized] More intuitive cover page functions and UI for each book.
[Optimized] Upgraded parental control with enhanced measures to avoid kids access.

[New] Preview functions added for paid books, better experience for purchase decision.
[Optimized] More intuitive cover page functions and UI for each book.
[Optimized] Upgraded parental control with enhanced measures to avoid kids access.

[Optimized] More straightforward registration and login process.
[Optimized] Payment process improved with minor updates.
[Optimized] Some bug fixes to enhance user experience.

[Optimized] Product recommendation page upgraded with refreshed look and feel.
[New] Unified access to events pages with more convenience.
[Optimized] Several little bugs fixed for better experience.

[New] Simplified versions of each story for younger children.
[New] Discovery page allows you to quickly find suitable books.
[New] Link your phone number to your account for increased security.
[Optimized] Updated login page to for a more simple sign in and sign up process.

[New] Simplified versions of each story for younger children.
[New] Discovery page allows you to quickly find suitable books.
[New] Link your phone number to your account for increased security.
[Optimized] Updated login page to for a more simple sign in and sign up process.
Fix some bugs and improve user experience.

1、Home page UI changed into horizontal scrolling for more convenience and consistency;
2、Fix some bugs and improve user experience.

1、Home page UI changed into horizontal scrolling for more convenience and consistency;
2、Fix some bugs and improve user experience.

[AR 2.0 New Release]
Peter Pan’s Adventure
Dive into Neverland and save Tinker Bell from the pirates. Based on the plot and characters from the Peter Pan books, this new interactive AR adventure game brings the world of make-believe to your living room. Answer questions and beat your opponent to become the winner and champion of Neverland.
AR 2.0 requires iOS 11 or above.

[AR 2.0 New Release]
Peter Pan's Adventure
Dive into Neverland and save Tinker Bell from the pirates. Based on the plot and characters from the Peter Pan books, this new interactive AR adventure game brings the world of make-believe to your living room. Answer questions and beat your opponent to become the winner and champion of Neverland.
AR 2.0 requires iOS 11 or above.

[AR 2.0 New Release]
Peter Pan's Adventure
Dive into Neverland and save Tinker Bell from the pirates. Based on the plot and characters from the Peter Pan books, this new interactive AR adventure game brings the world of make-believe to your living room. Answer questions and beat your opponent to become the winner and champion of Neverland.
AR 2.0 requires iOS 11 or above.

[New] Option to receive verification code by voice message.
[New] User privacy policy now more clear.
[Optimized] Bug fixes.

1、AR2.0 Optimized and updated for a better user experience;
2、Minor bug fixes.
Young eyes need regular breaks from the screen. We've added settings to help you manage these breaks.
[Optimized] Minor bug fixes.
[Optimized] Minor bug fixes.
[Optimized] Minor bug fixes.

[New] Introducing the new Leveled Reading Books, to help develop English reading skills step by step;

[Optimized] The original books are now Story Books, and have been reclassified to make it easier to find the right book;

[New] Reading report, easily check the progress and results of learning at any time;

[Optimized] Improved design and experience in new user guide and help center in login，payment, and communication functions etc.
